title: The Precursors: Cezanne, Gaugin, Van Gogh
creator_credit: Danielle Van De Putte, Pierre Alibert, Les Films du Cypres and International Film Bureau
brief_description: Portrays the influence of impressionism as exemplified in Cezanne’s preoccupation with construction, Gauguin’s use of descriptive backgrounds and Van Gough’s attempt to evoke emotion rather than display craftsmanship. Narrated by Phillip Gaunt.
creator_credit_for_label: Danielle Van De Putte, Pierre Alibert, Les Films du Cypres and International Film Bureau
description: Portrays the influence of impressionism as exemplified in Cezanne’s preoccupation with construction, Gauguin’s use of descriptive backgrounds and Van Gough’s attempt to evoke emotion rather than display craftsmanship. Narrated by Phillip Gaunt.
